simsigcompanion-desc: Adds a suite of special pages and functions to support SimSig communities.
mysimsig-updated: Your simulation ownerships have been updated.
mysimsig-pageheader: You can use this page to manage your SimSig simulations ownership information. Select any simulations you own licenses to. Any free simulations are greyed out and are automatically included for you.
mysimsig-error-nosims: No simulations have been configured for this wiki. Please contact the wiki administrator for assistance.
